overview: Savanna and her girlfriend are caught in bed by Savanna's enraged husband. He freaks out, and the girlfriend accidentally kills him. They run away and end up in Needles, California, where the real nightmare begins...starting with a local psycho impersonating a cop. Think of it as Thelma and Louise meets The House of 1000 Corpses. Only Savanna squirts and the anal scenes will amaze you. This is B. Skow at his darkest...not for the faint of heart. Or faint of pants.
tagline: You Can't Bury The Past Forever.
title: Miles From Needles
